input.sentences: when i got in town i went for a walk .
there were many unique shops there .
i bought a few things and then walked around some more .
after a while i went to my hotel .
output.sentences: I went on vacation to an exotic town to walk around and explore different buildings.
I stopped to eat in a cafe, in a huge building with lots of windows.
The cafe had a nice view of the street and other buildings so I could people watch.
There was a quaint antique shop in a building with a high peaked roof.
I stayed in a friend's huge mansion that was bigger than some palaces.
